QuestData.Title: The Depths of Depravity
QuestData.Description: They're keepin' Daegarn locked up in a cage at the large fightin' ring nearby. From what I've gathered, the Dragonflayers bring out their prisoners to battle against their most powerful gladiators. They dump the losers in the basement where Scourge necromancers turn 'em into ghoulies! It's horrifying!$B$BBut first things first! The tablets are strewn about all across this dungeon. Let's get those recovered before you go off tryin' to be a hero.
QuestData.LogDescription: Glorenfeld at the Utgarde Catacombs wants you to collect 10 Wyrmskull Tablets.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done well, mate. Now that we've secured the tablets we can try and save Daegarn's life and recover the cipher that will help us decode the meaning behind these ancient relics!$B$BI'll hold on to these tablets, you rescue Daegarn.
